server.control.database

Class NotifyEmailDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.control.database.NotifyEmailDB

  • public class NotifyEmailDB
extends Object
    The Class NotifyEmailDB sends e-mails to all clients that have appointments in the next 24 hours.

      static Object handleMessage(Request request, Connection connection)
      HandleMessage function process the request from client, sends SQL queries to mySQL database by using JDBC connector The function process the queries results then return a message to the client with the requested details.

    • Method Detail

      • handleMessage

        public static Object handleMessage(Request request,
                                   Connection connection)
        HandleMessage function process the request from client, sends SQL queries to mySQL database by using JDBC connector The function process the queries results then return a message to the client with the requested details.
        Parameters:
        request - The request object that send by the client
        connection - JDBC connection parameter
        Returns:
        return Object type. each result may return different type of objects.

        Generate and send email.
        Parameters:

        name - the name
        Throws:
        javax.mail.internet.AddressException - the address exception
        javax.mail.MessagingException - the messaging exception
